page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
This district is in the{St. Helens {Police Division}of the{Merseyside { Police (or Constablary). The{Chief Constable}or Police Commissioner is{Mr.Kenneth Oxford. His office is at{Merseyside Police {Head Quarters Liverpool. When the local{police force}needs help to solve a very serious crime, the{regional crime squad}is called in. Plain clothes detectives belong to a particular department.It is called the{C.I.D. Our local police station is located at Burrows Lane.
{The Legal System. Local residents who are{Justices of {the Peace are:Mr.Green & Mrs Snowling. The nearest{Magistrates Court}is {Coporation Street.}The{Crown Court}is usually held in{Liverpool.
